text: Ej kasone, ki imon ʙa Man ovarded va pajravi rasuloni Man hasted! Az pokizahoi on ci sumo ʙa dast ovardaed az on ci Mo az zamin ʙarojaton rujondem, nafaqa kuned va qasd makuned, ki sifati pasti onro, ʙa kamʙaƣalon ʙidihed va hol on ki agar in guna ciz (nafaqa) ʙa sumo doda savad, xudaton girandai on nested, magar on ki az ʙadii on casm ʙipused. Pas ci guna rozi mesaved ʙaroi Alloh onro, ki xud namepisanded? Va ʙidoned, ki Alloh az sadaqahoi sumo ʙenijoz va dar hama hol sazovori sitois ast
